channel.title: Help FAST please!
channel.description:
Ok a just made a really long script without saving.
I used the function GetSelf.hide and at the end getself.show.
It showing back up once ive ended the script. Am i fucked and have to start again (which i am not doing) or is there a way to show it again?
please reply if you have any ideas

item.title: Help FAST please!
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

[quote=“bullzeye”]Lol uhh sorry

Try puting [scar]if(isfkeydown(11))then begin getself.show; terminatescript; end;[/scar] Alot throughout the script.[/quote]

Its cool man I know that but it was supposed to end when you pressed it 5 times, i had to make another script to hold in F12 and it eventually ended. Lol

Edit: now i look at it i could have rewrote it in 5 minutes lol it aint long.

Read full topic

item.title: Help FAST please!
item.dc:creator: @Martin Martin
item.description:
@Martin wrote:

bullzeye:

Would you mind posting the script?

WTF, umm sure if you tell me how to get it

Read full topic
